word_mean: 宇宙空间中物质之间按照牛顿万有引力定律相互吸引的力。

list.abs: 这个效应称为重力透镜 (gravitational lensing)，而上面这种形态的影像称为爱因斯坦十字架 (Einstein Cross)。 更有意思的是，爱因斯 …
gravitational attraction 引力，重力gravitational constant 引力常数，引力常量gravitational field 引力场，重力场
重力加速度(Gravitational acceleration)是一个物体受重力作用的情况下所具有的加速度。 假设一个质量为m的质点与一质量为M的均匀球体的距离为r时,质量所受的重力.
毛细管水(capillary water)指由于毛管力所保持在土壤颗粒毛细管内的水分。植物所吸收的水分主要是毛细管水。重力水(gravitational water)指水分饱和的土壤中,在重力作用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin gravitatio(n-), from the verb gravitare (see gravitate)

entry.def: In physics, gravitation is the force which causes objects to be attracted towards each other because they have mass.

means.word_mean: 1. (physics) the force of attraction between all masses in the universe; especially the attraction of the earth's mass for bodies near its surface;

sentences.sentence: "the more remote the body the less the gravity"
"the gravitation between two bodies is proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them"
"gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love"--Albert Einstein

means.word_mean: 2. movement downward resulting from gravitational attraction;

sentences.sentence: "irrigation by gravitation rather than by pumps"

means.word_mean: 3. a figurative movement toward some attraction;

sentences.sentence: "the gravitation of the middle class to the suburbs"

auth_sentence.content: Thus gravitation appears as a purely quantum mechanic phenomen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus gravitation appears as a purely quantum mechanic phenomen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus gravitation appears as a purely quantum mechanic phenomen.

auth_sentence.content: Classical Mechanics models gravitation as an imaginary attractive force.
auth_sentence.res_content: Classical Mechanics models gravitation as an imaginary attractive force.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Classical Mechanics models gravitation as an imaginary attractive force.

auth_sentence.content: How would one prove gravitation theory using scientific method?
auth_sentence.res_content: How would one prove gravitation theory using scientific method?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How would one prove gravitation theory using scientific method?

stems_affixes.word_buile: grav重+e→n.坟墓 adj.严肃的,庄重的
grav重+e→n.坟墓 adj.严肃的,庄重的
gravid[adj.怀孕的, 妊娠的]+a→n.孕妇
gravitate[v.受吸引,受重力作用下沉]+ion表名词→n.地心吸力,引力作用
grav重+ity表名词→n.重力,引力;严肃,庄重

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受吸引,受重力作用下沉

means.word_mean: 吸引力;倾向,趋势,地心引力

sentences.en: By gravitation the sun and planets act and react upon one another.
sentences.cn: 太阳与行星通过引力发挥作用并相互影响。

sentences.en: The sun’s gravitation was bending the beam of light.
sentences.cn: 太阳的引力使光束弯曲。

sentences.en: It is gravitation that causes the apple to fall.
sentences.cn: 是地心吸引力使苹果下落。

sentences.en: We owe to Newton the principle of gravitation.
sentences.cn: 万有引力原理的发现应归功于牛顿。
